title: Sleep and Body Composition
description: A quick win: understand Sleep and Body Composition.

hook.text: Two groups ate the same calories. One slept 8.5 hours. The other slept 5.5. The results were striking.

buildup.text: Both groups lost weight. But the sleep-deprived group lost 55% more muscle and 55% less fat.
